user_query: I'm planning a trip to New York City with my friends next month. Can you provide me with the latest COVID-19 news and statistics for New York City to help us make informed decisions? Additionally, we would like to explore the top-level domains available for our website. Please fetch the list of top-level domains for us.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest COVID-19 news and statistics for New York City.
Retrieve the list of top-level domains available for websites.
